data.title: News Radio WHAM 1180 Radio Station Information
data.text:
Radio Station Information

News Radio WHAM 1180

WHAM 1180 AM

Rochester's News Radio WHAM 1180

City of License:

Rochester, NY

Format:

News/Talk

Market:

Rochester, NY

Web site:

https://wham1180.iheart.com

Live Stream:

http://www.iheart.com/live/1505

Owner:

iHeartMedia (Citicasters Licenses, Inc.)

Address:

207 Midtown Plz

Rochester, NY 14604

Phone:

(585) 222-1180

WHAM is an AM radio station broadcasting at 1180 KHz. The station is licensed to Rochester, NY and is part of that radio market. The station broadcasts News/Talk programming and goes by the name "News Radio WHAM 1180" on the air with the slogan "Rochester's News Radio WHAM 1180". WHAM is owned by iHeartMedia.

Nearby Radio Stations

WITR 89.7 FM, WHIC 1460 AM, WKDL 104.9 FM, WARM 101.3, 98.9 The Buzz, WLGZ 102.7 FM, 95.7 The Fan Rochester, Fox Sports 1280, WXXI 1370 AM, 104 WDKX
